ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Resists [was: Finally :)]
ygData.msgSnippet: No I loved my bard and my guild and the game, I just was playing too long (2.5 years now) and saw a very short to no future left for me.  I ve seen and done
ygData.messageBody:
No I loved my bard and my guild and the game, I just was playing too long
(2.5 years now) and saw a very short to no future left for me. I've seen
and done just about everything there is to do, and wanted to get back to the
real world. So account cancelled, all characters deleted.

Shada Iceheart [Retired]

> You're retired? Did you quit playing the game? Or did you
> switch to a
> different class? If you switched classes, why did you do it?
> I retired my
> bard at 50 so I'm curious.
>
> Caelrie - 50 enchanter on Fennin Ro
